body:
Vizzhy (October 2024 - Present)

  • Technology Stack – OpenAI, React, Next.js, Tryterra, Zoom API, AWS.
  • Led a team of 7, managing development and client priorities.
  • Integrated OpenAI-powered transcription and AI analytics.
  • Built IoT data visualizations using Tryterra.
  • Developed Zoom API integrations for meetings.

Deputee (Mid 2024 - October 2024)

  • Technology Stack – React, Next.js, Redux, AWS.
  • Optimized React & Next.js applications for performance.
  • Improved SSR, suspense loaders, and API caching.
  • Enhanced state management using Redux and React Query.

Infomedia (January 2023 - Mid 2024)

  • Technology Stack – Angular 16, RxJS, Micro Frontends, CircleCI, SQL Server.
  • Migrated AngularJS to Angular 16 for better scalability.
  • Developed a platform-agnostic payment system.
  • Implemented CI/CD pipelines using CircleCI.

Mylan Data Management (October 2021 - January 2023)

  • Technology Stack – Angular, Python, SQL Server, - Azure Services.
  • Built UI using Reactive Forms in Angular.
  • Implemented SSO login with Azure Managed Identity.
  • Developed file upload to Azure Blob Storage using Azure Functions.
  • Contributed to backend logic in Python.

• Technology Stack - Flutter, Stripe and Agora SDK.
  • Developed layouts for multiple mobile applications.
  • Implemented Web RTC to create an online chat room feature in a mobile application.
  • Implemented Stripe payment gateway feature in a mobile application.

• Technology Stack - Flutter, PHP and MySQL.
  • Developed a medical file sharing application Full - Stack.
  • Developed and designed UI elements for the application
  • Developed API to save user data and files using PHP
